product_name: Canari Elite Bike Bibs - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Canari Elite Bike Bibs deliver great comfort on long rides with their seamless inner thigh construction, a padded chamois and mesh bib upper that won't constrict your abs. Nylon/spandex shorts wick away sweat, dry fast and stretch easily. 8-panel design creates an anatomic fit for excellent performance. Bib upper wicks and breathes and takes the pressure off your abdomen as you ride. Built-in, seamless molded chamois provides padded comfort for long stretches in the saddle. Silicone grippers at cuffs keep the Canari Elite Bike Bibs from riding up. Reflective trim. Closeout.
short_description: The Canari Elite Bike Bibs deliver great comfort on long rides with their seamless inner thigh construction, a padded chamois and mesh bib upper that won't constrict your abs.
